topics.body:
I know I keep going back to league of legends, but you know what the game should have?  Genderswap skins:
(warning saucy)
[spoiler]!http://th05.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/i/2013/262/a/4/don_t_feed_rengar_by_exaxuxer-d6myhj7.jpg![/spoiler]


Also for those of you that are interested in the game or might try it I would suggest trying it; there's free champions that you can play every week and the tutorial is informative and start with beginner bots, but the main tip I have is DO NOT SAY HI TO THE TURRET WITH YOUR FACE, wait until the turret is busy with the minions before attacking it and if your health is low use B to teleport back to base to recharge your health.

I'm totally serious about how a lot of people ragequit after the first game after going "Oh hi Mr. Turret; would you like a hug?"
